argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmodvsubval2.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lmodvsubval2.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lmodvsubval2.m | |- .- = ( -g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lmodvsubval2.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lmodvsubval2.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lmodvsubval2.n | |- N = ( invg ` F ) |
| 7 |  | lmodvsubval2.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` W ) = ( invg ` W ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8, 3 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .- B ) = ( A .+ ( ( invg ` W ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .- B ) = ( A .+ ( ( invg ` W ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 8, 4, 5, 7, 6 | #P_lmodvneg1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. B ) = ( ( invg ` W ) ` B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. B ) = ( ( invg ` W ) ` B ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .+ ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. B ) ) = ( A .+ ( ( invg ` W ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .- B ) = ( A .+ ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. B ) ) ) |
